Lol another reupload. This one is sad due to the fact that mc despite being a huge retard- he didn't deserve it. If you've read the translated scans you see he "rejects" her proposal about her moving back in with him because he has the sickly sweet idea that he needs to be man worthy of her by being able to provide for her (more like earn more than her tbh) and as so he viewed her betrayal of him as her having been upset about the rejections and long distance relationship. Had he KNOWN that the dumb broad willingly gave in to her rapist (he doesn't know she was taken advantage of at 1st) before the supposed rejections occurred he'd know that she was an untrustworthy hoe who couldn't even stand up for herself but again, being the nice guy he is he figured she cheated because he made her feel unwanted+long distance relationship.


That said he IS total retard for keeping her knowing she had another dudes kid. Somewhat believable to forgive if she wasn't pregnant with what he THOUGHT he k
